page.title: 06AMENITIES IN GEISE AREA
page.content: THERE ARE VERY FEW AMENITIES IN THIS AREA. THE CHILDREN ALL ATTEND SCHOOLS IN NEARBY THURSO OR LIEURARY COMMUTING BY BUS. THERE ARE NO SHOPS AND THE NEAREST SHOPPING CENTRE IS IN THURSO. THERE IS A POST-OFFICE AT JANETSTOWN AND A A RESTRICTED BUS SERVICE IS OPERATED ON THIS ROAD CONSISTING OF A POST BUS COMING FROM TONGUE IN SUTHERLANDSHIRE INTO THURSO EACH MORNING AND RETURNING TO TONGUE EACH AFTERNOON. THE B874 HAS A SLIGHTLY BETTER BUS SERVICE WITH BUSES RUNNING FROM HALKIRK TO THURSO. GLENGOLLY THE LARGEST HOUSING SCHEME HAS A PLAYPARK FOR THE CHILDREN WHICH WAS FUNDED AND BUILT BY THE LOCAL GLENGOLLY RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION.
